Points.Name: Harmon's Quest #4
Points.Objects2: Balron/hue/500/name/Oberon the Wicked/ADD/<simplenote/size/3/name/Harmon's note/notestring/Father, if you are reading this it means that I shall not return. I have been lost in these hellish depths for days, and now I hear evil approaching. I fear there is no escape. I should never have left in anger. I was wrong. I wanted you to know that I am sorry.>:MX=1:SB=1:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=SETONCARRIED,Harmon's Quest/Objective2/KILLNAMED,Oberon the Wicked/Completed1/true/Objective3/GIVENAMED,Harmon,Harmon's note/Description3/Return the note to Harmon:MX=1:SB=1:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1

Points.Name: Harmon's Quest #2
Points.Objects2: SETONTHIS/freerun/true:MX=1:SB=1:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=SETONTHIS/gumpstate/(-null-)/:MX=1:SB=2:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=GUMP,Harmon,4/You see a sad old man holding a small tin cup. His hands are trembling and he mumbles something incoherently. You come closer.;Help him out with a few coins as a responsible citizen of Britannia;help;Kick him and tell him to move along;kick;Distract him and pick his pockets;steal;Ask him to repeat what he said;ask:MX=1:SB=2:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=WAITUNTIL,0,1/gumpstate!(-null-)/44:MX=1:SB=2:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=SETONTHIS/gumpstate/(-null-):MX=1:SB=3:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=GUMP,Harmon's Quest,3/Please find my son...:MX=1:SB=3:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=WAITUNTIL,0,1/gumpstate!(-null-)/66:MX=1:SB=3:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=SETONTHIS/proximityactivated/false:MX=1:SB=33:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=SETONTHIS/freerun/false:MX=1:SB=33:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=GOTO/1/1:MX=1:SB=33:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=IF/gumpstate="steal"/88:MX=1:SB=44:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=IF/gumpstate="help"/90:MX=1:SB=44:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=IF/gumpstate="kick"/95:MX=1:SB=44:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=IF/gumpstate="accept"/77/33:MX=1:SB=66:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=GIVE/<questholder/name/Harmon's Quest/titlestring/Locate Harmon's son./objective1/Search the depths of Hythloth.:MX=1:SB=77:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=SETONTRIGMOB/MSG/*Receives Harmon's Quest*:MX=1:SB=77:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=SOUND,61:MX=1:SB=77:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=SENDMSG/He is penniless...:MX=1:SB=88:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=GOTO/33:MX=1:SB=88:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=SENDMSG/He shakes his head and refuses your money..:MX=1:SB=90:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=GOTO/33/:MX=1:SB=90:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=SENDMSG/He simply continues sobbing..:MX=1:SB=95:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:OBJ=GOTO/33/1:MX=1:SB=95:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1
